attributes.action: act on the ilegal charging of bank customers who go overdrawn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i respectivaly request the goverment to have a public enquiry in to the possible illigal bank charges which are cripling many pople in our country and to publish the enquiry at the 1st available moment no more than 1 year after starting said action then to act on the results on same time scale
